paper.title: On the Security of RSA Padding
paper.abstract: This paper presents a new signature forgery strategy. The attack is a sophisticated variant of Desmedt-Odlyzkou0027s method [11] where the attacker obtains the signatures of m1;...; mΤ-1 and exhibits the signature of an mΤ which was never submitted to the signer; we assume that all messages are padded by a redundancy function µ before being :[55],"interacting with the signer, the attacker selects Τ smooth1 µ(mi)- values and expresses µ(mΤ) as amultiplicative combination of the padded strings µ(m1);...; µ(mΤ-1).
